title: How to Make Ahi Poke

steps.headline: Cut the ahi into cubes, smaller than an inch.
Chop and mince the white and green onions to get the amount needed of both.
Combine and mix all ingredients together.
Chill in the refrigerator and serve when needed.

text: Cut the ahi into cubes, smaller than an inch.  Chop and mince the white and green onions to get the amount needed of both.  Combine and mix all ingredients together.  Chill in the refrigerator and serve when needed.
